sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { GalleryContainer, GalleryH1, GalleryH2, GalleryWrapper, GalleryCard, GalleryIcon, GalleryP } from './GalleryComponents'; import Icon1 from '../../Images/music.svg'; import Icon2 from '../../Images/cooking.svg'; import Icon3 from '../../Images/reading.svg'; import Icon4 from '../../Images/exercise.svg'; import Icon5 from '../../Images/writing.svg'; const Gallery = () => { return ( <> Hobbies Music Even though my training as a violin player is in classical music, I enjoy music across all genres and languages. Recently, I've really gotten into Kenshi Yonezu's music. Go check him out! Cooking Born out of my love for good food, I'm always eager to try out new recipes. Szechuan cuisine is a personal favorite! Reading I've always been an avid fantasy reader. Two of my top picks would definitely be Way of Kings and Name of the Wind. Always open to book recommendations! Exercise A short distance swimmer at heart, swimming has been a big part of my life for years. When I'm not in the pool, I'll attempt to work out. Occasionally. Writing I'm always striving to be a better writer and thinker. It's my way of learning how the world works. Check out some of my articles here! ) } export default Gallery
